author: mtosi
body:
as requested by tracking POG (@VinInn @rovere @makortel )
this PR does
1. fix the client (some hit efficiency plots were missing)
2. add the monitoring of muon->innerTrack
3. new plots are under Muons/Tracking/innerTrack
(as suggested/requested/proposed by @VinInn )

NB: @VinInn (sorry) but I forgot the note I took and I do not remember which selection you want to apply
as now all muons are used !
see
https://github.com/mtosi/cmssw/blob/3afeefbebe6685b3d99d3734535f37e4a70c7129/DQM/TrackingMonitor/python/MonitorTrackInnerTrackMuons_cff.py#L5

(yes, I will do the PR for the master branch as well, of course)
title: add muon->innerTrack monitoring in DQM
